description: Application to vary conditions 9, (car parking) 10, ( refuse storage) 22, (energy statement) 23, (energy strategy) 24 (heating/energy) and 25 (CHP plant) of approved planning ref: C2016/73625 to allow for the relocation of the gas kiosk, bin and cycle stores (adjacent to Camlet House/Energy Centre). C2016/73625: ''Variation of condition 3 (Phasing Plan), 18 (Mitigation), 24 (Heating/Energy) and 44 (Drawing Numbers) (minor material amendment application) of previously approved Outline application no. PLAHIS Planning Application Reference: DM2023/01708--- Address: Former Felnex Trading Estate190 London RoadHackbridgeSM6 7EL--- Proposal: Application Reference Number: C2016/73672/ARM	Date of Decision: 15/09/2016Condition Number(s): Condition 5 - Approved drawingsConditions(s) Removal:Minor variation to the appearance of the building elevation in order for the internal arrangement of the residential dwellings to comply with planning informatives such as Lifetime Homes, Building Regulations and the London Plan, as well as for Fire Protection (change of balustrade to non-combustible metal railing and removal of ACM) and structural coordination.Elevations - 09143-APT-FGH-E1, 09143-APT-FGH-E2, 09143-APT-FGH-E3, 09143-APT-FGH-E4, 09143-APT-FGH-E5, 09143-APT-FGH-E6, 09143-APT-R-E1, 09143-APT-R-E2, 09143-APT-R-E3, 09143-APT-R-E4, 09143-APT-NST-E1, 09143-APT-NST-E2, 09143-APT-NST-E6, 09143-APT-NST-E7, 09143-APT-U-E1, 09143-APT-U-E2, 09143-APT-U-E3, 09143-APT-U-E4, 09143-T2, 09143-T3, 09143-T4, 09143-T5, 09143-T6, 09143-T8, 09143-T16, 09143-T17.Plans - 091403-APT-FGH-P1, 091403-APT-R-P1, 091403-APT-R-P2, 091403-APT-U-P1, 091403-APT-U-P2, 091403-APT-LMNST-P1, 091403-APT-LMNST-P2, 091403-APT-LMNST-P3, 091403-A-P2, 091403-B1-P1, 091403-C-P1, 091403-C-P2, 091403-C-P3, 091403-D-P1, 091403-D-P2, 091403-E-P1, 091403-E-P2, 091403-E-P4, 091403-E-P5, 091403-E-P6, 091403-F-P1, 091403-H-P1, 091403-H-P2, 091403-K-P2This application is to amend and replace the drawings associated with Condition 5 ?The Development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans? Etc, from reserved matters application c2016/73672. With this application we propose the regularisation of the elevations for blocks F / G / H / R / S / T / U / House plots 440 to 493. Blocks also known as Perkin Court, Scarlet House, Batik Court, Camlet House, Cord House, Yarn Court, Seam Court. Houses also referred as 2 - 44 Thimble Crescent, 1 - 19 Calico Avenue, 3 - 15 (odd Nos) Fe

PLAHIS Planning Application Reference: DM2023/01712--- Address: Former Felnex Trading Estate190 London RoadHackbridgeSM6 7EL--- Proposal: Application Reference Number: C2016/73625	Date of Decision: 06/09/2016Condition Number(s): 9, 10, 22, 23, 24, and 25Conditions(s) Removal:Minor variation to the location of the Bin Store, Cycle Store and Gas Kiosk due to Utilities Network requirements and Sewer easement.This application is to amend and replace the drawings associated with Conditions 9, 10, 22, 23, 24 and 25 of application C2016/73625, Planning drawing,09143-BAR-K-02-D shows a separate Bin and Cycle store. The Bin Store is located adjacent to Block R (Camlet House) and the Cycle Store is located adjacent to the Energy Centre that adjoins Block R (Camlet House). The Gas Kiosk is located below Block R (Camlet House). The Utilities Network required the Gas Kiosk to be relocated adjacent to the Energy Centre in the location of the Cycle Store. This is where the Gas Kiosk has been built. There is a sewer easement that runs in between Block R (Camlet House) and Block F (Perkin Court). This restricts the relocation of the Bin and Cycle Store. The only location that is suitable to avoid the easement is to the east of Block R (Camlet House). The new proposed location for the Bin Store is to the east of Block R (Camlet House) adjacent to the boundary, with the cycle store being proposed to the north of Block F (Perkin Court) adjacent to the boundary. Drawing 17246-App07-001 and 17246-App07-002 show the approved location and the as built location. Drawing 09143-BS01 and 09143-CS01 show the existing Bin and Cycle Store plans and elevations. Drawing 17246-App07-003 shows the plans and elevations for the Bin store with drawing 17246-App07-004 shows the plans and elevations of the Cycle Store.--- Status: REC--- Decision: --- Date Decision Issued: ---
